name: Contact and Forms

inScope: Integration with a static-site-compatible third-party form service
Basic spam protection for the contact form
outOfScope: CRM integration or advanced lead tracking
Analytics and conversion tracking beyond basic page analytics

commitments.description: Implement /contact page with name, email, and message fields and accessible validation.
Wire the contact form to the chosen third-party form provider endpoint with success/error handling.
Provide a visible mailto fallback link that opens the user’s client with prefilled subject/recipient.
Implement simple spam protection (e.g. honeypot field) compatible with the form provider.
Ensure contact form styling matches the dark off-black theme and overall design language.

deliverables.description: Astro implementation of the /contact page with form and mailto link.
Configuration for the form provider endpoint (e.g. environment variables or config file entries).
README section explaining how to change recipient email/address and provider configuration.

functional: Valid submissions reach the third-party form provider and show a success message.
Invalid submissions surface clear validation errors.
Mailto fallback opens the user’s client with correct recipient and subject.
reliability: If the provider is unavailable, the page shows a graceful error and still exposes the mailto link.
security: Honeypot or similar anti-bot mechanism is active and tested.

dependenciesAndRisks: Availability and reliability of the chosen form provider.
Correct configuration of provider endpoints and environment variables to avoid lost messages.
Future CRM or tracking integrations may require follow-up ADRs and contracts.
